H0.text: Whose play about the Salem witch trials in the 17th century drew parallels to McCarthyism in the 1950s. Arthur Miller

H1.text: Whose play about the Salem witch trials in the 17th century drew parallels to McCarthyism in the 1950s. Tennessee Williams

H2.text: Whose play about the Salem witch trials in the 17th century drew parallels to McCarthyism in the 1950s. Eugene O'Neill

H3.text: Whose play about the Salem witch trials in the 17th century drew parallels to McCarthyism in the 1950s. Timebends

A4.text: Miller likened the situation with the House Un-American Activities Committee to the witch hunt in Salem in 1692.
